instructions: Open the Alexa app on your Android or iOS device and click on the menu icon in the top left corner. Select Skills & Games and then click on the magnifying glass icon in the top-right corner. From here, search for Plex . Choose the Plex skill and click on the Enable to Use button. You will need to sign in to authenticate your Plex account. Click on Authorize to link your Plex account to the Alexa skill.
